Ocotillo Community Park.knownFor: “ Cute city park with shaded playground ” Reviewed April 16, 2016 Ocotillo has a cute community park on the Northern outskirts of town. The park has a shaded play area for small children, basketball court, baseball diamond, shaded picnic area with barbecue grill as well as restrooms and drinking fountain.
